snippet: Vivian Green built a life after a rocky start in New York, but a job loss in 2011 and her mother’s declining health have left monthly bills piling up.
abstract: Vivian Green of Brooklyn received money from Catholic Charities of Brooklyn and Queens to help pay for her utility bills; Catholic Charities is one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund.
lead_paragraph: Vivian Green built a life after a rocky start in New York, but a job loss in 2011 and her mother’s declining health have left monthly bills piling up.

headline.print_headline: Using Song and a Dose of Laughter to Ease a Family’s Pains
